card.name: GRU Draft Archetypes GRU
card.text: {W}{U} DESTINY Your creatures are meant for more. Seek their destiny and thrive. {U}{B} TAPPING Your coven of witches can conjure powerful magic together through tap effects. {B}{R} SPIRITS Call upon the Aos Si of the Otherworld and lead a Spirit army. {R}{G} RAID Go forth, warrior, and conquer. Attack and reap the benefits. {G}{W} ATTACK Lead an army and benefit when you attack with three or more creatures. {W}{B} OATHS Your word is sacred. Stick to your sworn Oaths and be rewarded. {B}{G} LIFEGAIN Seek immortality, or at least seek to outlast your opponents. {G}{U} STRENGTH Only the strongest can reach the top. Focus on power 4 or greater and let might make right. {U}{R} TACTICS Manage your attacks with support: Vehicles, abilities, and combat tricks will see you succeed. {R}{W} GRAVEYARD The memories of the dead will lead you to victory; use your graveyard as a resource to win.

card.name: Solemn Caoineag
card.text: Solemn Caoineag gets +1/+0 as long as you've gained life this turn.

card.name: Hawthorn Witch
card.text: Whenever Hawthorn Witch becomes tapped, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Mournful Muse
card.text: When Mournful Muse enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Relentless Galloglas
card.text: Relentless Galloglas can't block. {2}{B}: Return Relentless Galloglas from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: An-Drim Brigand
card.text: When An-Drim Brigand enters the battlefield, it swears an Oath. (Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Bloody Handed Coven
card.text: {2}, {T}: Target player loses 2 life. Activate only if you own two or more cards in exile.

card.name: Loathsome Dullahan
card.text: When Loathsome Dullahan dies, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Ar Dacha Bloodletter
card.text: When Ar Dacha Bloodletter enters the battlefield, it swears an Oath. (Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Ar Dacha Bloodletter has menace as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Monarch of Night
card.text: When Monarch of Night enters the battlefield, if you control two or more other Spirits, up to one target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Night-Wreathed Raider
card.text: When Night-Wreathed Raider enters the battlefield, if you've gained 3 or more life this turn, each opponent loses 3 life. Otherwise, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Tur Aun Rover
card.text: Vigilance Tur Aun Rover enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it as long as you've gained life this turn.

card.name: Nimble Scrambler
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Inspiring Brigand
card.text: When Inspiring Brigand dies, create a 2/2 green and white Human Warrior creature token.

card.name: Fehr Maun Reaver
card.text: Raid — This spell costs {1} less to cast if you attacked this turn.

card.name: Dún Raider
card.text: Dún Raider has haste as long as you control another creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Handmaid of Cos Teilo
card.text: When Handmaid of Cos Teilo enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, add {G}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as step and phases end.

card.name: Ornery Badger
card.text: Trample Whenever Ornery Badger becomes blocked, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Reclusive Druid
card.text: When Reclusive Druid enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token and a green artifact token named Mistletoe with "{1}, Sacrifice Mistletoe: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life."

card.name: Wolftamer
card.text: When Wolftamer enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token, then you gain 1 life for each Wolf you control.

card.name: Hungry Forager
card.text: {5}{G}: Hungry Forager gets +3/+3 until end of turn. This ability costs {X} less to activate, where X is the amount of life you've gain this turn. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Lord of the Glens
card.text: Trample, haste

card.name: Brash Upstart
card.text: Haste {T}, Sacrifice Brash Upstart: Brash Upstart deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Bloody Handed Novitiate
card.text: {2}, Exile Bloody Handed Novitiate from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 red and white Spirit creature token with "This creature can't block."

card.name: Roving Galloglas
card.text: {R}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Roving Galloglas gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Barrow Watcher
card.text: When Barrow Watcher enters the battlefield, if you control another Spirit, up to one target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Fervent Raiders
card.text: Haste Raid — Fervent Raiders enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.

card.name: Canny Swordmaster
card.text: Raid — {2}{R}: Canny Swordmaster gains first strike until end of turn. Activate only if you attacked this turn.

card.name: Blade of Fehr Maun
card.text: When Blade of Fehr Maun deals combat damage to a player, you may discard a card. If you do, Blade of Fehr Maun swears an Oath. (Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Otherworld Stalker
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {2} or exile two creature cards from your graveyard.

card.name: Hand of the Black Horse
card.text: Trample Raid — When Hand of the Black Horse enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Marsh Light
card.text: Whenever Marsh Light becomes tapped, target creature you control gains ward {1} until the beginning of your next upkeep.

card.name: Honored Raven
card.text: Flying Whenever Honored Raven becomes tapped, scry 1.

card.name: Lake Guardian
card.text: Flash When Lake Guardian enters the battlefield, put two destined counters on target creature you control with destiny.

card.name: Unell's Stag
card.text: Unell's Stag can't be blocked as long as you control another creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Shoreline Shrieker
card.text: Flying Whenever Shoreline Shrieker becomes tapped, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: An-Drim Tidecaller
card.text: When An-Drim Tidecaller enters the battlefield, untap up to two target creatures you control.

card.name: Scourge of the Seas
card.text: Scourge of the Seas can't attack unless you control another creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Keening Psychopomp
card.text: Flying When Keening Psychopomp enters the battlefield, target Human gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Tur Aun Trapper
card.text: First strike

card.name: Ill-Fated Raven
card.text: Flying Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Proud Stalwart
card.text: When Proud Stalwart enters the battlefield, it swears an Oath. (Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) First strike

card.name: Noble Savage
card.text: Flash

card.name: Placid Cattle
card.text: {W}, Exile Placid Cattle from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Hero of Ar Dacha
card.text: When Hero of Ar Dacha enters the battlefield, it swears an Oath. (Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Lifelink

card.name: Take Up the Cause
card.text: Create two 2/2 green and white Human Warrior creature tokens. You gain life equal to the number of creatures that attacked this turn.

card.name: Towering Paragon
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, the creature you control with the least power swears an Oath. (Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)

card.name: Face the Mighty
card.text: Choose one — • Exile target creature with power 4 or greater. • Target creature you control swears an Oath (Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)

card.name: Bones of the Past
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. Tap any number of untapped creatures you control with total power 4 or greater: Exile enchanted creature.

card.name: Urgent Exorcism
card.text: Destroy target Spirit or enchantment.

card.name: Menhir's Might
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each counter on it.

card.name: Puca's Blessing
card.text: Enchant creature When Púca's Blessing enters the battlefield, draw a card. Whenever a card you own is put into exile, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature. This ability triggers only once per turn.

card.name: Oath of Penance
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control two or more untapped creatures, Oath of Penance is fulfilled. When Oath of Penance is fulfilled, exile it and distribute two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures.

card.name: Oath of Purity
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with creatures with total power 3 or more this turn, Oath of Purity is fulfilled. When Oath of Purity is fulfilled, exile it and destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Guardian Fenoderee
card.text: Flash When Guardian Fenoderee enters the battlefield, untap target creature you control.

card.name: Aspiring Hero
card.text: Whenever Aspiring Hero attacks, you may exile X cards from your graveyard, where X is Aspiring Hero's power. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Aspiring Hero.

card.name: Priest of Annan
card.text: Flash When Priest of Annan enters the battlefield, prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. If damage is prevented this way and if you've fulfilled an Oath, Priest of Annan deals that much damage to any target.

card.name: Fehr Maun Tactician
card.text: Destiny (Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.) Whenever Fehr Maun Tactician attacks, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each destined counter on Fehr Maun Tactician. [3/3]

card.name: An-Drim Cavalry
card.text: When An-Drim Cavalry enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green and white Human Warrior creature token. Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, tap up to one target creature.

card.name: Legion of Annan
card.text: Create two 1/1 red and white Spirit creature tokens with "This creature can't block." You may cast Legion of Annan from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs.

card.name: Luth's Prodigy
card.text: When Luth's Prodigy enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Stormfront
card.text: Exile target tapped creature.

card.name: Spirit Ring
card.text: When Spirit Ring enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Spirit Ring leaves the battlefield. {1}{W}, Exile Spirit Ring from your graveyard: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Humble Beginnings
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, target creature you control swears an Oath. (Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)

card.name: Divine Spear
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. Equipment you control have "Equip—Tap two untapped creatures you control."

card.name: Oath of Silence
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may tap an untapped creature you control. If you do, Oath of Silence is fulfilled. When Oath of Silence is fulfilled, exile it and target opponent can't cast noncreature spells until your next turn.

card.name: Sinister Bodach
card.text: Defender Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield, untap Sinister Bodach.

card.name: Yew-Tree Omen
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap an untapped creature you control or pay {1}. Counter target spell.

card.name: Northern Storm
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, counter that spell unless its controller pays {4} instead.

card.name: Punishment of Seantas
card.text: Enchant creature When Punishment of Seantas enters the battlefield, you may tap an untapped creature you control. If you do, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Oath of Remembrance
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you have seen two or more cards while scrying this turn, Oath of Remembrance is fulfilled. When Oath of Remembrance is fulfilled, exile it and draw two cards then discard a card.

card.name: Crow's Knowledge
card.text: Draw two cards, then discard a card unless you tap an untapped creature you control.

card.name: Winter's Cut
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If it's your turn, untap up to one target creature you control.

card.name: Fox's Guile
card.text: Untap target creature. It gets +0/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Prepare a Voyage
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Target creature gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is 2 plus the total power of creatures tapped to pay for this spell.

card.name: Otherworldly Protection
card.text: Target nonland permanent you control phases out. Scry 1. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Salmon of Wisdom
card.text: When Salmon of Wisdom enters the battlefield, scry 2. {1}{G}, Sacrifice Salmon of Wisdom: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and draw a card.

card.name: Raven-Caller
card.text: Whenever Raven-Caller becomes tapped, create a 1/1 black Bird creature token with flying.

card.name: Fehr Maun Dredger
card.text: When Fehr Maun Dredger enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, instead put that creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Devouring Mist
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature you control becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, Devouring Mist gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Ponder the Ogham
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap an untapped creature you control. Scry 2, then draw two cards.

card.name: Consult the Oillipheist
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each creature you control with power 4 or greater. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Council of Ravens
card.text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Target player mills a card.

card.name: Wash Downriver
card.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Behind the Veil
card.text: Enchant nonland permanent Tap any number of untapped creatures you control with total power 3 or greater: Enchanted permanent phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: The Great Game
card.text: {2}, {T}: Put a game counter on The Great Game, then tap target nonland permanent with mana value less than or equal to the number of game counters on The Great Game.

card.name: Feast of Skulls
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target creature. • Exile target planeswalker. • Exile target player's graveyard.

card.name: Touch of the Otherworld
card.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If you have fulfilled an Oath, instead that creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn.

card.name: Night's Edict
card.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature or an enchantment. If you control two or more Spirits as you cast this spell, instead that player sacrifices a creature and an enchantment.

card.name: Plague of Par Holon
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard. Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the exiled card's power.

card.name: Oath of Pilgrimage
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if a player lost 2 or more life this turn, Oath of Pilgrimage is fulfilled. When Oath of Pilgrimage is fulfilled, exile it and you draw two cards and lose 2 life.

card.name: Etched Epitaph
card.text: Choose one — • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Target creature you control swears an Oath. (Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)

card.name: Crow's Feast
card.text: Target player discards two cards. If they discard a creature card, create a 1/1 black Bird creature token with flying.

card.name: Midnight Bloom
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gains deathtouch and "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."

card.name: Bloody Handed Cultist
card.text: Spirits you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Warmonger of Dún
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Warmonger of Dún swears an Oath (Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Rigann's Scion
card.text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Rigann's Scion and each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Rigann's Herald
card.text: When Rigann's Herald enters the battlefield, choose one — • Choose up to two nonlegendary Oaths you control. Those Oaths are fulfilled. • Return target creature or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Unstoppable Cateran
card.text: Destiny (Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.) When Unstoppable Cateran dies, if it had three or more destined counters on it, return it to the battlefield tapped. [3/2]

card.name: Keening Maiden
card.text: Menace Whenever a non-Spirit creature would die, exile it instead.

card.name: After the Storm
card.text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonland permanent an opponent controls. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Oath of Resurrection
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if there are four or more creature cards in your graveyard, Oath of Resurrection is fulfilled. When Oath of Resurrection is fulfilled, exile it and return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Druid's Sickle
card.text: Equipped creature has deathtouch and "{T}, Tap an untapped land you control: Create a green artifact token named Mistletoe with "{1}, Sacrifice Mistletoe: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life." Equip {2}

card.name: Invoke the Black Horse
card.text: Target opponent reveals all but one of the cards in their hand. Choose a nonland card from among the revealed cards. That player discards that card.

card.name: Oath of Storytelling
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may reveal any number of cards from your hand with at least three different mana values. If you do, Oath of Storytelling is fulfilled. When Oath of Storytelling is fulfilled, exile it and search your library for a card. Put that card into your hand and shuffle.

card.name: Lost to Time
card.text: Choose one — • Exile target player's graveyard. That player loses life equal to the number of card types exiled this way. • Remove all counters from target permanent. That permanent's controller loses life equal to the number of counters removed this way.

card.name: Oath of Celebration
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you have discarded two or more cards this turn, Oath of Celebration is fulfilled. When Oath of Celebration is fulfilled, exile it and it deals 3 damage to target opponent.

card.name: Rise to the Occasion
card.text: Rise to the Occasion deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature's mana value is 6 or greater, Rise to the Occasion deals 6 damage to it instead.

card.name: Becoming the Hound
card.text: Becoming the Hound deals 2 damage to target creature. Gain control of that until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Swords Raised
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Dreams of the Black Horse
card.text: Discard two cards, then draw three cards. {2}, Exile Dreams of the Black Horse from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 red and white Spirit creature token with "This creature can't block."

card.name: Weathered Claymore
card.text: Whenever equipped creature becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, Weathered Claymore deals 1 damage to target player. Equip {1}

card.name: Frenzy of Battle
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Frenzy of Battle deals 1 damage to target player.

card.name: Coastal Storm
card.text: Exile target artifact. Raid — If you attacked this turn, Coastal Storm deals 2 damage to that artifact's controller.

card.name: Night's Herd
card.text: Whenever a creature blocks this turn, it deals 1 damage to itself. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Bog Swine
card.text: Whenever Bog Swine becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, up to one target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Dún Cutpurse
card.text: When Dún Cutpurse enters the battlefield, discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards.

card.name: Unell's Charger
card.text: Trample Whenever Unell's Charger attacks, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Unell's Charger gets +1/+1 for each creature tapped this way.

card.name: Unell's Summons
card.text: Create four 1/1 red and white Spirit creature tokens with "This creature can't block."

card.name: Martial Sluagh
card.text: Martial Sluagh has menace and trample as long as you control three or more Spirits.

card.name: Wolf of Usraigh
card.text: Haste As long as it's not your turn, Wolf of Usraigh is a 1/3 Human Peasant.

card.name: Padraig, Bear of Tur Aun
card.text: Whenever Padraig, Bear of Tur Aun enters the battlefield or attacks, you may exile three cards from your graveyard. When you do, Padraig deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Sacred Menhir
card.text: When Sacred Menhir enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target player equal to the number of Shrines you control. Tap four untapped creatures you control: Create a token that's a copy of Sacred Menhir.

card.name: Oath of Destruction
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control two or more tapped creatures, Oath of Destruction is fulfilled. When Oath of Destruction is fulfilled, exile it and it deals 3 damage to each creature.

card.name: Luth's Judgement
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may exile three cards from your graveyard. Choose target creature you control and target creature you don't control. The creature you control gets +3/+1 until end of turn if the additional cost was paid. Then those creatures fight each other.

card.name: Patience of Annan
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has first strike and "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker."

card.name: Dolmen of the Si
card.text: Attacking Spirits you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Luth's Ire
card.text: Destroy target noncreature, nonenchantment permanent.

card.name: Calm Before the Storm
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control, then that creature deals damage equal to its power to another target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Oath of Might
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Oath of Might is fulfilled. When Oath of Might is fulfilled, exile it and put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.

card.name: Foggy Dew
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: In the Wild Woods
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card and/or a land card from among them and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Moonlight Raid
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, untap enchanted creature and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Impenetrable Oaks
card.text: Enchant land When Impenetrable Oaks enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to up to one target creature with flying. Enchanted land has "{T}: Add {G}{G}."

card.name: Into the Barrow Mounds
card.text: Raid — Put a land card onto the battlefield tapped. Then if you attacked this turn, untap that land.

card.name: Break the Oath
card.text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Roving Bard
card.text: Destiny (Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.) {T}: Add {G}. If there are three or more destined counters on Roving Bard as you activate this ability, instead add three mana of any one color. [1/2]

card.name: Joint Eater
card.text: Whenever an opponent gains life, you gain half that much life, rounded down. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Ar Dacha Stalwart
card.text: Whenever Ar Dacha Stalwart deals combat damage to a player, it swears an Oath. (Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Wandering Raider
card.text: Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, put a +1/+1 counter on Wandering Raider.

card.name: Steed of Annan
card.text: Whenever Steed of Annan attacks, you may exile two cards from your graveyard. If you do, exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

card.name: Wild-Song Chanter
card.text: When Wild-Song Chanter enters the battlefield, create three 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens. Whenever a creature you control enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Lurking Dobharchú
card.text: Haste Hexproof from blue

card.name: An-Drim Exemplar
card.text: Sacrifice An-Drim Exemplar: Until the beginning of your next end step, if one or more creature tokens would be created under your control, that many 2/2 green and white Human Warrior creature tokens are created instead.

card.name: Relentless Clash
card.text: Destroy target noncreature permanent.

card.name: Unite the Kingdoms
card.text: Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. As long as you control eight or more lands, creatures you control have vigilance.

card.name: Oath of Serenity
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more creatures with power 4 or greater, Oath of Serenity is fulfilled. When Oath of Serenity is fulfilled, create a 6/6 green Spirit Bear creature token.

card.name: Bull-Rush of Culaigh
card.text: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

card.name: Oath of Sorrows
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, Oath of Sorrows is fulfilled. When Oath of Sorrows is fulfilled, exile it and return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Ominous Banshee
card.text: When Ominous Banshee enters the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to the number of Spirits you control. Other Spirits you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Barrow Mounds
card.text: Tap two untapped creatures you control: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Stag of High Tara
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on Stag of High Tara. {G}{U}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Stag of High Tara can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Unell's Warleader
card.text: Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Unell's Warleader and up to one other target creature.

card.name: Battle Fury
card.text: Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, create a 2/2 green and white Human Warrior creature token that's tapped and attacking.

card.name: An-Drim Mourncaller
card.text: When An-Drim Mourncaller enters the battlefield, it swears an Oath. (Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Whenever you fulfill an Oath, put a +1/+1 counter on An-Drim Mourncaller.

card.name: Otherworld Chariot
card.text: Flying Whenever Otherworld Chariot becomes crewed for the first time each turn, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Fearr Gorta
card.text: Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses that much life. This ability triggers only once each turn. Sacrifice a creature: Fearr Gorta gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Howling Lamentation
card.text: When Howling Lamentation enters the battlefield, you may discard up to two cards. If you do, draw that many cards. {1}, Exile a creature card from a graveyard: Create a 1/1 red and white Spirit creature token with "This creature can't block."

card.text: Menace Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: War-Tested Chariot
card.text: Haste Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Oath to the High King
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control two or more basic lands, Oath to the High King is fulfilled. When Oath to the High King is fulfilled, create a 2/2 green and white Human Warrior creature token.

card.name: Clairseach Harp
card.text: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Solemn Cloister
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Sacred Tomb
card.text: Sacred Tomb enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Sacred Tomb: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Gloomy Clearing
card.text: Gloomy Clearing enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Gloomy Clearing: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Scoured Spire
card.text: Scoured Spire enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Scoured Spire: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Overgrown Wreck
card.text: Overgrown Wreck enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Overgrown Wreck: Search your library for a Forest or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: The Answerer
Ar Dacha Braggart
card.text: When Ar Dacha Braggart enters the battlefield, it swears an Oath. (Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Oath of Vengeance
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if two or more creatures you don't control died this turn, Oath of Vengeance is fulfilled. When Oath of Vengeance is fulfilled, exile it and target player loses 1 life for each creature card in their graveyard.

card.name: Capal Dú, High King
card.text: Capal Dú, High King isn't a creature unless you own two or more cards in exile. Menace Whenever an attacking creature you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Unell, the Wanderer
card.text: Unell, the Wanderer isn't a creature unless you own two or more cards in exile. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color. Unell's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.

card.name: Oath Fulfilled GRU
card.text: When you have fulfilled an Oath, you can place the exiled card here.

card.name: Luth, Forge's Fire
card.text: Luth, Forge's Fire isn't a creature unless you own two or more cards in exile. Skip your draw step. At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them this turn. Spell cast this way cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Annan, Wry Voyager
card.text: Annan, Wry Voyager isn't a creature unless you own two or more cards in exile. Whenever another creature you control becomes tapped, put a wind counter on Annan. {3}{U}, {T}, Remove X wind counters from Annan: Put target creature into its owner's library just beneath the top X cards of that library. X can't be zero.

card.name: Rigann, Thread Cutter
card.text: Rigann, Thread Cutter isn't a creature unless you own two or more cards in exile. Whenever a creature you don't control deals combat damage, put a fate counter on it. {X}{X}, {T}: Destroy each creature with mana value X or less with a fate counter on it.

card.name: Orflaith the Still
card.text: [+1]: Up to two target creatures you control each swear an Oath. [-2]: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. [-5]: Each opponent loses 3 life for each Oath you've fulfilled.

card.text: Flying

card.name: Teller of Truths
card.text: Destiny (Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.) Teller of Truths gets +2/+0 as long as it has three or more destined counters on it. [1/3]

card.name: Rigann's Seer
card.text: Destiny (Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.) {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if Rigann's Seer has three or more destined counters on it. [1/3]

card.name: Rigann's Blackguard
card.text: Destiny (Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.) Whenever Rigann's Blackguard attacks, untap up to X target creatures you control, where X is the number of destined counters on Rigann's Blackguard. [2/2]

card.name: Prophecy of the Hound
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature you control named Seantas, Hound of Ulaith dealt combat damage to an opponent this turn, Prophecy of the Hound is fulfilled. When Prophecy of the Hound is fulfilled, exile it and target player loses the game.

card.name: Seantas, Hound of Ulaith
card.text: When Seantas, Hound of Ulaith enters the battlefield, destroy target non-Human creature an opponent controls. Whenever Seantas attacks alone, you may exile an enchantment card from your hand. If you do, Seantas swears an Oath. (Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Cos Teilo, Generous King
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, its controller chooses one. This ability triggers only once each turn. • Each player draws a card. • Cos Teilo, Generous King deals 2 damage to each player. • Each player may put a +1/+1 counter on a creature they control.

card.name: Luth's Favored
card.text: Destiny (Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.) Sacrifice Luth's Favored: You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of destined counters on Luth's Favored. [1/1]

card.name: Meaha, Onerous Queen
card.text: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, put a doom counter on target creature you control. Creatures with doom counters on them deal damage to players in the form of poison counters. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

card.name: Black Coach
card.text: Whenever a creature crews Black Coach, put a mortality counter on that creature. Do this only once each turn. Whenever a creature you control with a mortality counter on it dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step. Crew 3

card.name: Mistletoe GRU
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice Mistletoe: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Maebh of the Bloody Hand
card.text: Whenever a Warlock you control becomes untapped, each opponent loses 1 life. Tap five untapped creatures you control: You may cast target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard without paying its mana cost. When you do, exile it when it resolves. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Oath of Pursuit
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent controls at least two more lands than you, Oath of Pursuit is fulfilled. When Oath of Pursuit is fulfilled, exile it and destroy target land.

card.name: Craven Haunter
card.text: Destiny (Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.) Craven Haunter gets +1/+0 and has flying as long as it has three or more destined counters on it. [1/2]

card.name: Tur Aun Brawler
card.text: Destiny (Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.) Tur Aun Brawler can't blocked by creatures with power less than the number of destined counters on it. [2/2]

card.name: Youthful Hurler
card.text: Destiny (Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.) Youthful Hurler gets +2/+2 and has first strike as long as it has three or more destiny counters on it. [1/1]

card.name: Chieftan of the Black Horse
card.text: Flying Whenever Chieftan of the Black Horse enters the battlefield or attacks, choose one — • Each player discards a card. • You draw a card and you lose 1 life. • Remove all counters from target permanent.

card.name: Ciara, Blood Witch
card.text: Ciara, Blood Witch gets +1/+1 for each enchantment card you own in exile. Sacrifice a creature: Target creature you control swears an Oath. (Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

card.name: Si of the Heaths
card.text: Destiny (Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.) Si of the Heaths gets +2/+1 and has flying as long as it has three or more destined counters on it. [2/3]

card.name: Tur Aun Mystic
card.text: Destiny (Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.) As long as Tur Aun Mystic has three or more destined counters on it, if you would draw a card, instead scry 1 then draw a card. [2/1]

card.name: The Oillipheist
card.text: The Oillipheist enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on The Oillipheist. Then if its power is 4 or greater, it gains ward {2} until the beginning of your next upkeep, and if its power is 8 or greater, it gains trample until the beginning of your next upkeep.

card.name: Victorious Galloglas
card.text: Raid — {2}: Victorious Galloglas gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn and only if you've attacked this turn. If a creature dealt damage by Victorious Galloglas this turn would die, exile it instead.

card.name: Knight of Cos Teilo
card.text: When Knight of Cos Teilo enters the battlefield, it swears an Oath. (Reveal an Oath you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Double strike

card.name: Destiny's End
card.text: Each player who controls a creature with three or more counters on it draws a card, then destroy all creatures.

card.name: Bloody Handed Seer
card.text: Destiny (Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.) At the beginning of your upkeep, if Bloody Handed Seer has three or more destined counters on it, draw a card. [0/4]

card.name: Queen of the Si
card.text: Play with the top card of your library revealed Queen of the Si gets +2/+2 as long as the top card of your library is a creature. {1}{R}, Discard a card: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

card.name: Oath of the Wilds
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control four or more creatures that don't share a creature type, Oath of the Wilds is fulfilled. When Oath of the Wilds is fulfilled, exile it and search your library for a green creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Reaver of Tur Aun
card.text: Destiny Reaver of Tur Aun gets +1/+1 for each destined counter on it. Sacrifice Reaver of Tur Aun: Return target permanent card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is Reaver of Tur Aun's power. Activate only as a sorcery. [2/2]

card.name: Oath of Memory
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if any player milled three or more cards this turn, Oath of Memory is fulfilled. When Oath of Memory is fulfilled, exile it and target player mills half their library, rounded up.

card.name: Inexorable Assault
card.text: Raid — If you've attacked this turn, this spell can't be countered, players can't gain life this turn and damage can't be prevented this turn. Inexorable Assault deals 4 damage to any target.

card.name: March Across Ulaith
card.text: Whenever you tap a basic land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.

card.name: Otherworldly Dreams
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the total power of creatures tapped this way. Put two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Inevitable Fate
card.text: Counter target spell. If a spell is countered this way, put it into its owner's library just beneath the top X cards of that library, where X is the number of creatures you control with destiny.

card.name: Ciara's Disciple
card.text: Whenever Ciara's Disciple becomes tapped, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to that card's mana value.

card.name: Meaha's Promise
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may pay 3 life. If you, Meaha's Promise is fulfilled. When Meaha's Promise is fulfilled, exile it and destroy up to two target nonland permanents an opponent controls.

card.name: Naira, Vindictive Sluagh
card.text: Destiny (Whenever this creature becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.) Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you've attacked this turn, Naira, Vindictive Sluagh deals damage equal to the number of destined counters on it to any target. [3/4]

card.name: Glorious Raid
card.text: Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, creature you control get +1/+1 until end of turn and you draw a card.

card.name: Siofra the Changeling
card.text: You may have Siofra the Changeling enter as a copy of a creature on the battlefield, except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types and it has "Tap three other untapped creatures you control: Exile this creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control."

card.name: Falniss, Fated Hound
card.text: As long as Falniss, Fated Hound is attacking, prevent all damage that would be dealt to it. Whenever Falniss becomes the target of a spell or ability, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Ellein Trechend
card.text: Flying, first strike, haste Whenever Ellein Trechend enters the battlefield or attacks, you may exile three target cards from a single graveyard. If you do, it deals 3 damage to target player and you gain 3 life.

card.text: First strike Tap another untapped creature you control: Put an aim counter on Fehr Maun Marksman. {2}{W}, Remove two aim counters from Fehr Maun Marksman: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Cross from Beyond
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap three untapped creatures you control. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Balar, the Burning Eye
card.text: Balar, the Burning Eye enters the battlefield with three omen counters on it. Whenever Balar becomes tapped, remove an omen counter from it. {T}: Balar deals 6 damage to target player. Activate only if there are no omen counters on Balar.

card.name: Journey Home

card.text: Your opponents can't cast noncreature spells this turn. Up to one target nonlegendary Oath you control is fulfilled.

card.name: Make a Break for It
card.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. Sacrifice it at the beginning of its controller's next end step."

card.name: Deep-Forest Prowler
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, you may draw a card.

card.name: Sea's Edge
card.text: Sea's Edge enters the battlefield tapped. When Sea's Edge enters the battlefield, untap target creature you control. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Coastline Village
card.text: Coastline Village enters the battlefield tapped. When Coastline Village enters the battlefield, untap target creature you control. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

card.text: Midnight Dolmens enters the battlefield tapped. When Midnight Dolmens enters the battlefield, untap target creature you control. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

card.text: High King's Hall enters the battlefield tapped. When High King's Hall enters the battlefield, untap target creature you control. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

card.name: Apple Orchard
card.text: Apple Orchard enters the battlefield tapped. When Apple Orchard enters the battlefield, untap target creature you control. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

card.name: Oath of Humility
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent controls a creature with power 4 or greater, Oath of Humility is fulfilled. When Oath of Humility is fulfilled, exile it and exile target creature an opponent controls. That creature's controller draws a card.

card.name: Across the Sea
card.text: Enchant Spirit When Across the Sea enters the battlefield, target non-Spirit creature phases out. It can't phase back in as long as you control enchanted creature. (Treat phased out permanents and anything attached to them as though they don't exist.)

card.name: Oath of Negation
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you have 7 life or less, Oath of Negation is fulfilled. When Oath of Negation is fulfilled, exile it and it deals 3 damage to any target, you gain 3 life, and if a creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Sea's Wrath
card.text: Sea's Wrath deals 3 damage to each creature, each planeswalker, and each opponent.

card.name: Life Anew
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. For each point of excess damage dealt this way, return up to one target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Life Anew.

card.name: Giant's Causeway
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. If that mana is spent on an enchantment spell, that spell can't be countered.

card.name: Rigann's Prophecy
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if a legendary creature died this turn, Rigann's Prophecy is fulfilled. When Rigann's Prophecy is fulfilled, exile it and search your library for a legendary creature card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Slumbering Hill
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {4}: Slumbering Hill becomes a 3/4 Giant creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Sceatha's Marvel
Brooch of High Tara
card.text: {1}, {T}: Put a destined counter on target creature. If that creature doesn't have destiny, it gains destiny and "This creature gets +2/+2 as long as it has three or more destined counters on it." (Whenever a creature with destiny becomes tapped, put a destined counter on it. Stop at three.)

card.name: Stone of Destiny
card.text: If a triggered ability of another legendary permanent you control would trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Rigann's Dreaming
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, choose one — • Exile that creature card from its owner's graveyard. If you do, you gain life equal to its mana value. • You may pay life equal to that creature's mana value. If you do, return it to the battlefield tapped under your control.

card.name: Fables of Unell
card.text: Whenever a creature you control enters the battlefield, you may have Fables of Unell become a copy of that creature until end of turn. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Fables of Unell. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Great Hunt of Capal Dú
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life. X can't be zero. Destroy each permanent with mana value X.

card.name: Annan's Voyage
card.text: Target opponent takes an extra turn after this one. That player skips the combat phase of that turn. At the beginning of your next upkeep, take an extra turn after that one. The first time you attack during that turn, untap all creatures you control and there is an additional combat phase after that phase.

card.name: Luth's Decree
card.text: Players can't win the game unless a source they control has dealt combat damage to a player this turn. Players can't lose the game unless they have been dealt combat damage this turn. Each creature you control has vigilance and can block an additional creature each combat.
